title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct market research, gather user feedback, and document functional and non-functional requirements.

title: System Architecture Design (Updated)
description: Update the description to reflect changes. Design the overall system architecture, including the 3D modeling engine, user interface, cost estimation module, feasibility analysis components, and data storage solutions. Ensure scalability, performance, maintainability, security, and cross-platform compatibility. Define the communication protocols and data flow between components. Identify potential third-party libraries or tools to be integrated (e.g., Three.js for 3D modeling, TensorFlow.js for machine learning), as well as any proprietary components that need to be developed in-house. Ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices for 3D modeling, real-time cost estimation, and data security. Provide a detailed architecture diagram and documentation. Address the following additional considerations: 1) Modular design to allow for easy integration of future features and third-party tools. 2) Robust error handling and logging mechanisms. 3) User authentication and authorization mechanisms (e.g., OAuth). 4) Caching strategies for optimized performance, considering popular caching libraries like Redis or Memcached. 5) Deployment and scaling strategies for cloud or on-premises environments with a focus on containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes. 6) Implementing security measures such as encryption at rest and in transit, OAuth for user authentication, and regular security audits. Additionally, consider the use of microservices architecture for better scalability and maintainability. Suggest potential tools or frameworks that could help achieve this design, focusing on modern web and cloud technologies like React, GraphQL, AWS, Google Cloud Platform, and Serverless Architecture. If possible, explore options for serverless cost estimation and feasibility analysis components.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user data, home designs, cost estimates, and other relevant information.

title: 3D Modeling Engine Development
description: Develop the core 3D modeling engine that allows users to design and customize their homes, including features like room creation, object placement, and material selection.

title: Cost Estimation and Feasibility Analysis
description: Implement the cost estimation module that calculates the estimated cost of the designed home based on materials, labor, and other factors. Develop the feasibility analysis component that checks for compliance with building codes and regulations.

title: User Interface Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the 3D housing configurator, including the main application interface, navigation, and user experience.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the various components of the application and perform comprehensive testing, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures to protect user data and ensure compliance with relevant regulations, such as data privacy laws and building codes.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, including servers, load balancing, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the application, including user guides, technical documentation, and support resources.
